patthana10.5:1.1: Nakusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana10.5:2.1: Nakusalaṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana10.5:3.1: Nakusalaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
patthana10.5:4.1: Nakusalaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana10.5:5.1: Nakusalaṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
patthana10.5:6.1: Nakusalaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana10.5:7.1: Nakusalaṁ noāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana10.5:8.1: Nakusalaṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana10.5:9.1: Nakusalaṁ naanāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana10.5:10.1: Nakusalaṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana10.5:11.1: Nakusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
patthana10.5:12.1: Nakusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
